name: Red Slippers
description:
Pen and Ink/ Color Pencil/ Charcoal/ Pastel on Cut Paper

Image Size 8x10 
White Matte Black Frame
Total Size 15x18

Each hand drawn image is carefully extracted with an x-acto knife and assembled layer upon layer to depict one singular candy coated scene. In some cases other mediums are introduced, such as textile cuttings and tracing paper to add some color, texture and depth. Each finished piece can have up to twenty different layers to create a more inviting scene.  

www.twistedbeautydesign.com
